description.value:
The investigator can select one of the following alchemist discoveries as an investigator talent:

  • @Compendium[pf1.class-abilities.lyqEPQDhcr20TTLD]{Combine Extracts}
  • @Compendium[pf1.class-abilities.rl7CfuBC0yFyIC7P]{Concentrate Poison}
  • @Compendium[pf1.class-abilities.RG1cy6Mqv8yk7vgE]{Dilution}
  • @Compendium[pf1.class-abilities.Oyxrd5pd7kkzsuJq]{Elixir of Life}
  • @Compendium[pf1.class-abilities.r6Nfpcar9v7YjfgD]{Enhance Potion}
  • @Compendium[pf1.class-abilities.sBkRwnCQsOWRFv4X]{Eternal Potion}
  • @Compendium[pf1.class-abilities.wTgdqbe6yI4A0WVu]{Extend Potion}
  • @Compendium[pf1.class-abilities.01lGus1TU5hTsrO3]{Infusion}
  • @Compendium[pf1.class-abilities.ufzQpQBCyoJ8M9DD]{Mutagen (Discovery)}
  • @Compendium[pf1.class-abilities.HaLB9xLAPdNCBQRP]{Poison Conversion}

When selecting an alchemist discovery, he must be high enough level to qualify for that discovery, using his investigator level as his alchemist level to determine if he qualifies.

This talent can be selected multiple times; each time grants a new alchemist discovery.
